title: go.talks: repo should pass tests
body:
At the moment the builder fails, because some of our demo programs don't build. Fix this.

Sample failure:

package code.google.com/p/go.talks/...
	imports code.google.com/p/go.talks/2012/chat/support
	imports code.google.com/p/go.talks/2012/chat/support: found packages main (chan.go) and defs (defs.go) in /tmp/gobuilder/linux-amd64-9742f722b558/src/code.google.com/p/go.talks/2012/chat/support
package code.google.com/p/go.talks/...
	imports code.google.com/p/go.talks/2012/concurrency/support
	imports code.google.com/p/go.talks/2012/concurrency/support: 
src/code.google.com/p/go.talks/2012/concurrency/support/helpers.go:1:1: expected
'package', found 'func'
package code.google.com/p/go.talks/...
	imports code.google.com/p/go.talks/2012/goforc
	imports code.google.com/p/go.talks/2012/goforc: found packages main (adder.go) and p (vars.go) in /tmp/gobuilder/linux-amd64-9742f722b558/src/code.google.com/p/go.talks/2012/goforc
package code.google.com/p/go.talks/...
	imports code.google.com/p/go.talks/2012/simple
	imports code.google.com/p/go.talks/2012/simple: found packages main (flag.go) and io (io.go) in /tmp/gobuilder/linux-amd64-9742f722b558/src/code.google.com/p/go.talks/2012/simple
package code.google.com/p/go.talks/...
	imports code.google.com/p/go.talks/2012/tutorial
	imports code.google.com/p/go.talks/2012/tutorial: found packages main (1get.go) and reddit (reddit.go) in /tmp/gobuilder/linux-amd64-9742f722b558/src/code.google.com/p/go.talks/2012/tutorial
